text: geudeul-i geudaeege sulgwa dobag-e daehae mul-euni, malhala : ‘geugeos-eneun keodalan joega issgo ingan-eul wihan hyoyong-i iss-euna geugeos-ui joega geugeos-ui hyoyongboda deo keudoda’. geudeul-i geudaeege mueos-eulo huisahaeya haneunji mul-euni, malhala : ‘yeobun-ui jaesan-ila’. geuleohge hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul wihae myeongbaeghi jingpyodeul-eul deuleonaesini geudaedeul-i suggohagi wiham-ila
